title: How do I add and remove devices?

blocks.content: Adding and removing devices in Mozilla VPN has never been easier. Follow this quick and simple 3 step guide to secure much-needed protection for all your devices.

content.content: Open the Mozilla VPN app on your preferred device
Voila! Your device has been automatically added to your VPN list of connected devices
Open Mozilla VPN in your chosen desktop or mobile device
Tap on “My Devices” in your VPN homescreen
Select the “Trash” icon next to the device you want to remove from your list of connected devices
